stories.text:
Have access to a large number of senior roles in FAANG with ability to put candidates directly to hiring dept upon basic experience review.

Looking for US based Software Engineers. Due to confidentiality agreement cannot share listing details publically here, but can do this privately via LinkedIn. Happy to discuss role details and comp packages etc.

If you are interested feel free to message me directly or send an invitation to connect. https://www.linkedin.com/in/karamvir-bhagat-457b46192/

Minimum 4 years of professional experience is neccessary, but if you do have close to this and good skills/experience do reach out. Happy to see what I can do to help you move up in career and salary.

Openings for: SDE II SDE III Front End Engineer Engineering Manager Senior Engineering Manager Senior Technical Program Manager Principal Technical Program Manager
